thread.section_title: Biblio.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Biblio.com | www.biblio.com
thread.title: Trish Cheatham

author: Trish Cheatham
title: Trish Cheatham
text:
I generally order from AMAZON, but their orders were going to take longer and cost more to receive.
I saw BIBLIO offered better terms, but I was skeptical about doing business since I had never heard of BIBLIO. I was hopeful that everything would ship as stated, since all (3) of my orders were coming separately and from multiple locations.
I would highly recommend this company.
